newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo rubber futures weaker ahead of spot expiry.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo rubber futures weaker ahead of spot expiry.

text.p: Tokyo rubber futures ended lower on Friday, pressured by selling for position-adjustment ahead of the spot expiry next week, traders said.
Prices ranged from unchanged to 2.1 yen per kg lower. Benchmark October was flat at 133.5 yen.
Activity was lacklustre. "Position-adjustment trade ahead of the spot expiry dominated trading," one trader said.
Expectations that not many players will want to take delivery when the spot May contract expires next Monday dampened market sentiment, traders said.
